snippet: Aida Mizquiri’s 10-year-old son has brittle bone disease, but having escaped an abusive relationship and obtained a visa, she hopes to return to work.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Aida Mizquiri buy books, winter clothing and comforters for her children.
lead_paragraph: Aida Mizquiri’s 10-year-old son has brittle bone disease, but having escaped an abusive relationship and obtained a visa, she hopes to return to work.

headline.print_headline: A Family on the Path Toward Greater Self-Sufficiency
headline.main: A Family on the Path Toward Greater Self-Sufficiency
